name: Super Robot Guy
description: Join our robotic hero on a journey through a 2D platform world inspired by the classic Super Mario Bros. game. As you maneuver through three exciting levels, beware of snail enemies and spinning saw blades that threaten to bring an end to your adventure. With tight controls and fast-paced action, this demo is sure to provide a challenge for players of all skill levels. Help our robot hero reach the end of each level and save the day in this nostalgic throwback to the golden age of platformers.
